title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending multiple lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, it triggers inefficient redraws of the entire client area, resulting in performance degradation.
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area, causing performance issues.
EB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode should trigger only one redraw of the affected area, maintaining performance efficiency.
SR:
1. Open StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append multiple lines to the text.
3. Observe the number of redraws occurring in the client area for each appended line.
